German Information Center Collection (Library of Congress)
LC copy is dubbed in English. It was produced in Germany, distributed in the U.S., and not intended for German distribution.

I. Federal Environment Minister Angela Merkel in the Bitterfeld region -- II. The Rhine, industry and tourism on Germany's most important inland waterway -- III. Aspirin, used for 100 years, now against cancer, too -- IV. A new beginning, Chinese pencils made in Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania -- V. Anne-Sophie Mutter, a world star enthralling audiences.

the 2005 Bundestag election and the future of German politics /

Introduction : the drama of 2005 and the future of German politics / Eric Langenbacher -- The tipping point : the 2005 election and the deconsolidation of the German party system? / David Conradt -- The extraordinary Bundestag election of 2005 : the interplay of long-term trends and short-term factors / Hermann Schmitt and Andreas M. Wüst -- The grand coalition : precedents and prospects / Ludger Helms -- From high hopes to on-going defeat : the new extreme Right's political mobilization and its national electoral failure in Germany / Lars Rensmann -- Angela Merkel : what does it mean to run as a woman? / Myra Marx-Ferree -- Merkel's EU policy : "Kohl's Mädchen" or interest-driven politics? / Dorothee Heisenberger -- The change in government and transatlantic relations / Jackson Janes -- Honecker's revenge : the enduring legacy of German unification in the 2005 election / Jeffrey Kopstein and Daniel Ziblatt -- From the outside in : Angela Merkel and the CDU / Clay Clemens.

Wahljahr 2009--Professionalisierung verzögert? / Christina Holtz-Bacha -- Europawahl 2009 : Wahlkampf im Schatten der Bundestagswahl oder doch eine europäische Kampagne? / Christina Holtz-Bacha & Jacob Leidenberger -- Kampagnenrezeption und Beteiligung an der Europawahl 2009 : eine Analyse auf der Basis einer Onlinebefragung / Harald Schoen -- "Wir haben mehr zu bieten" : die Plakatkampagnen zu Europa- und Bundestagswahl / Eva-Maria Lessinger & Christina Holtz-Bacha -- Angreifende Plakatwerbung im Wahlkampf--effektiv oder riskant? : ein Experiment aus Anlass der SPD-Europaplakate 2009 / Melanie Leidecker -- Auge in Auge mit Kandidatinnen und Kandidaten : emotionale Reaktionen auf Politikerplakate / Christina Holtz-Bacha & Eva-Maria Lessinger -- Politik häppchenweise : die Fernsehwahlwerbung der Parteien zur Europa- und Bundestagswahl / Christina Holtz-Bacha -- Normalisierung 2.0 : die Online-Wahlkämpfe deutscher Parteien zu den Bundestagswahlen 2002-2009 / Eva Schweitzer -- Wie viele Fans hat Angela Merkel? : Wahlkampf in Social Network Sites / Reimar Zeb -- "Unterhaltend, nicht repräsentativ" : die Bundestagswahl 2009 als Politshow auf Pro7 / Jörg-Uwe Nieland -- "Ich beantworte die Fragen so, wie ich mir das vorgenommen habe..." : eine dialoganalytische Untersuchung der Fernseh-Duelle im Wahlkampf 2009 / Christoph Tapper & Thorsten Quandt -- Die Protagonisten in der Fernseharena : Merkel und Steinmeier in der Berichterstattung über den Wahlkampf 2009 / Winfried Schulz & Reimar Zeb -- Ein Wahlkampf, der keiner war? : die Presseberichterstattung zur Bundestagswahl 2009 im Langzeitvergleich / Jürgen Wilke & Melanie Leidecker.
Reden zur Ehrenpromotion Angela Merkel, 3. Juni 2008, Universität Leipzig /

Includes the text of a speech made by Bundeskanzlerin Angela Merkel, in response to being awarded an honorary doctorate (Dr. rer. nat. Dr. h. c.) on June 3, 2008, by the Fakultät für Physik und Geowissenschaften of the Univertsität Leipzig.

edited by Ernst van Alphen, Mieke Bal, and Carel Smith.

Sincerity as subjectivity effect -- "Why do you tear me from Myself?" : torture, truth, and the arts of the Counter-Reformation / Jane Taylor -- Melody and monotone : performing sincerity in republican France / Katherine Bergeron -- The irreconcilability of hypocrisy and sincerity / Frans-Willem Korsten -- The rhetoric of justification : the preponderance of decisions over rules / Carel Smith -- Must we (NOT) mean what we say? : seriousness and sincerity in the work of J.L. Austin and Stanley Cavell / Hent de Vries -- Declining sincerity -- Can the subaltern confess? : Pasolini, Gramsci, Foucault, and the deployment of sexuality / Cesare Casarino -- Like a dog : narrative and confession in J. M. Coetzee's Disgrace and The lives of animals / Yasco Horsman -- Putting sincerity to work : acquiescence and refusal in postfordist art / David McNeill -- When sincerity fails : literatures of migration and the emblematic labor of personhood / Leslie A. Adelson -- Sincerity as a media effect -- A feeling of insincerity : politics, ventriloquy, and the dialectics of gesture in mediality / Jill Bennet -- Derrida on film : staging spectral sincerity / Michael Bachmann -- Documenting September 11th : trauma and the (im)possibility of sincerity / Alison Young -- Being Angela Merkel / Maaike Bleeker -- "Saying everything" and affected self-disclosure in the works of Reinaldo Arenas and Hervé Guibert / Reindert Dhondt.

4.4 Benefits of geothermal versus hydroelectric power generation 4.5 Rural geothermal electrification using low-enthalpy geothermal resources 5 Geological, geochemical and geophysical characteristics of geothermal fields 5.1 Geological and tectonic characteristics 5.2 Geothermal systems associated with active volcanism and tectonics 5.3 Geothermal systems associated with continental collision zones 5.4 Geothermal systems within the continental rift systems associated with active volcanism 5.5 Geothermal systems associated with continental rifts 6 Geochemical methods for geothermal exploration 6.1 Geochemical techniques 6.2 Classification of geothermal waters 6.3 Chemical constituents in geothermal waters 6.4 Dissolved constituents in thermal waters 7 Geophysical methods for geothermal resources exploration 7.1 Geophysical techniques 7.1 Heat flow measurements 7.2 Electrical resistivity methods 7.3 Magnetotelluric survey 7.4 Geophysical well logging 8 Power generation techniques 8.1 Overview 8.2 Criteria for the selection of working fluid 8.3 Heat exchangers 8.4 Kalina cycle 9 Economics of power plants using low-enthalpy resources 9.1 Drilling for low-enthalpy geothermal reservoirs 9.2 Drilling cost 9.3 Drilling costs versus depth 9.4 Well productivity versus reservoir temperature 9.5 Power production vs well head temperature and flow rate 9.6 High-enthalpy versus low-enthalpy power plants 10 Small low-enthalpy geothermal projects for rural electrification 10.1 Definition of small geothermal power plants 10.2 Characterization of resources and cost
